LanguageData.Storage_A1.label: Storage I
LanguageData.Storage_A1.description: Neolithic Storage: Learn to pots for storing food and wicker baskets.
LanguageData.Storage_B1.label: Storage II
LanguageData.Storage_B1.description: Medieval Storage: Learn to pots for storing food and wicker baskets.
LanguageData.Storage_B2.label: Storage III
LanguageData.Storage_B2.description: Medieval Storage: Learn to make general storage containers for everyday items.
LanguageData.Storage_B3.label: Storage IV
LanguageData.Storage_B3.description: Food and Grain Storage: Everything you need to keep your meals preserved and farm products safe and organized.
LanguageData.Storage_B4.label: Storage V
LanguageData.Storage_B4.description: Wardrobe Storage: Give your colonists a place to store their clothes and your tailors a place to keep their materials.
LanguageData.Storage_C1.label: Storage VI
LanguageData.Storage_C1.description: Drugs and Guns Storage: Medicine, booze, and weapons. Keep them separate, but organized.
LanguageData.Storage_C2.label: Storage VII
LanguageData.Storage_C2.description: Warehouse Storage: Pallet racks, utility shelving, display cases, and other very necessary storage units for a growing colony.
LanguageData.Storage_C3.label: Storage VIII
LanguageData.Storage_C3.description: Refrigeration: Freezers for long-term storage of food and produce, a well as a refrigerated display case which every cafe needs.
LanguageData.Storage_C4.label: Storage IX
LanguageData.Storage_C4.description: Arsenal: Safe and secure storage for weapons, ammo, and other important things that might or might not explode.
LanguageData.Storage_D1.label: Storage X
